142 void AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
143  cmplx16ImRe_t *rxChComp,
144  uint32_t numObj,
145  uint32_t numAnt,
146  cmplx16ImRe_t *symbolsIn,
147  cmplx16ImRe_t *symbolsOut)
148 {
149  int32_t Re, Im;
150  uint32_t i, j;
151  uint32_t antIndx;
152  uint32_t objIdx;
153 
154  for (objIdx = 0; objIdx < numObj; objIdx++)
155  {
156  j = 0;
157  /* Compensation of azimuth antennas */
158  for (antIndx = 0; antIndx < numAnt; antIndx++)
159  {
160  i = objIdx*numAnt + antIndx;
161  Re = ((int32_t) symbolsIn[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real -
162  (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag);
163 
164  Im = ((int32_t) symbolsIn[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag +
165  (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real);
166 
167  MATHUTILS_ROUND_AND_SATURATE_Q15(Re);
168  MATHUTILS_ROUND_AND_SATURATE_Q15(Im);
169 
170  symbolsOut[i].real = (int16_t) Re;
171  symbolsOut[i].imag = (int16_t) Im;
172  j++;
173  }
174  }
175 }
176 
203 uint32_t AoAProcHWA_SelectMaxPeaks(DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput * detList,
204  uint16_t *inIdxList,
205  uint32_t numInputPeaks,
206  DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput * outList,
207  float thresholdScal,
208  uint32_t maxNumOutPeaks)
209 {
210  int32_t i, j;
211  uint32_t numOutPeaks = 0;
212  uint32_t peakMax;
213  uint32_t peakMaxIdx;
214 
215  /* Mask below holds selected peaks. 32 peaks is enough since the maximum
216  * number of grouped peaks is up to 32,
217  * see DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_NUM_GROUPED_TARGETS_PER_RANGE_DOPPLER_PT */
218  uint32_t selectedBitMask = 0;
219  uint32_t threshold;
220 
221  if (numInputPeaks == 0)
222  {
223  goto exit;
224  }
225 
226  /* Find the highest peak */
227  peakMaxIdx = 0;
228  peakMax = 0;
229  for (i = 0; i < numInputPeaks; i++)
230  {
231  if (detList[inIdxList[i]].peak > peakMax)
232  {
233  peakMaxIdx = i;
234  peakMax = detList[inIdxList[i]].peak;
235  }
236  }
237  threshold = (uint32_t) (thresholdScal * (float) peakMax);
238  selectedBitMask |= 1 << peakMaxIdx;
239  outList[numOutPeaks++] = detList[inIdxList[peakMaxIdx]]; /*Copy maximum peak*/
240 
241  /* Find the other peaks */
242  for (j = 1; j < maxNumOutPeaks; j++)
243  {
244  peakMaxIdx = 0;
245  peakMax = 0;
246  for (i = 0; i < numInputPeaks; i++)
247  {
248  /* Skip already chosen peaks */
249  if ( !((selectedBitMask >> i) & 0x1) )
250  {
251  if (detList[inIdxList[i]].peak > peakMax)
252  {
253  peakMaxIdx = i;
254  peakMax = detList[inIdxList[i]].peak;
255  }
256  }
257  }
258  if(peakMax > threshold)
259  {
260  selectedBitMask |= 1 << peakMaxIdx;
261  outList[numOutPeaks++] = detList[inIdxList[peakMaxIdx]]; /*Additional peaks*/
262  }
263  }
264 
265 exit:
266  return numOutPeaks;
267 }
268 
304 uint32_t AoAProcHWA_peakGrouping(DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput * detList,
305  uint32_t numDetectedObjects,
306  uint32_t maxGroupedObjs,
307  uint16_t numAngleBins,
308  float thresholdScal,
309  uint16_t * outIdxList)
310 {
311 /* The 2D FFT surface is sumth, and the kernel size 3x3 is sufficient to pick
312  * up maximum peaks but due to HWA CFAR peak grouping issue in xwr18xx device, some peaks within
313  * CFAR iteration may be missed and the kernel size is increased to 5x5 */
314 #define KERNEL_SIZE 5
315 #define KERNEL_MIDDLE ((KERNEL_SIZE-1)/2)
316 
317  int32_t i, j, listIdx;
318  uint32_t numObjOut = 0;
319  int32_t cCol, cRow;
320  uint32_t discarded;
321  uint16_t discardListCnt;
322  int32_t mask = numAngleBins -1;
323  uint16_t detectedObjFlag;
324  uint32_t kernel[KERNEL_SIZE * KERNEL_SIZE];
325  uint16_t discardList[KERNEL_SIZE * KERNEL_SIZE];
326  int32_t tCol, tRow, kCol, kRow, mCol, mRow;
327  uint32_t threshold;
328  uint32_t peakMax;
329  int32_t numHalfAngleBins = (numAngleBins >> 1);
330 
331  /* Find the highest peak and set a threshold */
332  peakMax = 0;
333  for (i = 0; i < numDetectedObjects; i++)
334  {
335  if (detList[i].peak > peakMax)
336  {
337  peakMax = detList[i].peak;
338  }
339  }
340  threshold = (uint32_t) (thresholdScal * (float) peakMax);
341 
342  for (i = 0; i < numDetectedObjects; i++)
343  {
344  if (detList[i].peak < threshold)
345  {
346  continue;
347  }
348  /* pull the point from the list, cell under test (CUT) */
349  cCol = detList[i].cellIdx;
350  cRow = detList[i].iterNum;
351  discarded = detList[i].reserved;
352  detectedObjFlag = 0;
353  discardListCnt = 0;
354 
355  if (~discarded)
356  {
357  detectedObjFlag = 1;
358 
359  /* Fill the kernel with CUT, current row to the left of CUT, and the rows above the center row */
360  for (j = 0; j < numDetectedObjects; j++)
361  {
362  listIdx = i - j;
363  if (listIdx < 0)
364  {
365  listIdx = listIdx + numDetectedObjects;
366  }
367 
368  /* Row/col from the 2D FFT matrix: */
369  mCol = (int32_t) detList[listIdx].cellIdx;
370  mRow = (int32_t) detList[listIdx].iterNum;
371 
372  /* Translated and made signed to CUT position: */
373  tCol = (mCol - cCol) & mask;
374  tRow = (mRow - cRow) & mask;
375  if (tCol >= numHalfAngleBins)
376  {
377  tCol -= (int32_t) numAngleBins;
378  }
379  if (tRow >= numHalfAngleBins)
380  {
381  tRow -= (int32_t) numAngleBins;
382  }
383 
384  /* row/col in the kernel: */
385  kCol = tCol + KERNEL_MIDDLE;
386  kRow = tRow + KERNEL_MIDDLE;
387 
388  if (kRow < 0)
389  {
390  /* Stop search above this row */
391  break;
392  }
393 
394  if ((kCol >= 0) && (kCol < KERNEL_SIZE) && (kRow < KERNEL_SIZE))
395  {
396  /* Place symbol in a kernel: */
397  kernel[discardListCnt] = detList[listIdx].peak;
398  discardList[discardListCnt++] = listIdx;
399  }
400  }
401 
402  /* Fill the kernel current row to the right of CUT and rows below the center row */
403  for (j = 1; j < numDetectedObjects; j++)
404  {
405  listIdx = i + j;
406  if (listIdx >= numDetectedObjects)
407  {
408  listIdx = listIdx - (int32_t) numDetectedObjects;
409  }
410 
411  mCol = (int32_t) detList[listIdx].cellIdx;
412  mRow = (int32_t) detList[listIdx].iterNum;
413 
414  tCol = (mCol - cCol) & mask;
415  tRow = (mRow - cRow) & mask;
416  if (tCol >= numHalfAngleBins)
417  {
418  tCol -= (int32_t) numAngleBins;
419  }
420  if (tRow >= numHalfAngleBins)
421  {
422  tRow -= (int32_t) numAngleBins;
423  }
424 
425  kCol = tCol + KERNEL_MIDDLE;
426  kRow = tRow + KERNEL_MIDDLE;
427 
428  if (kRow > (KERNEL_SIZE -1))
429  {
430  /* Stop search below this row */
431  break;
432  }
433 
434  if ((kCol >= 0) && (kCol < KERNEL_SIZE) && (kRow >= 0))
435  {
436  kernel[discardListCnt] = detList[listIdx].peak;
437  discardList[discardListCnt++] = listIdx;
438  }
439  }
440 
441  /* Compare the CUT (in kernel[0]) to its neighbors. */
442  for (j = 1; j < discardListCnt; j++)
443  {
444  if (kernel[j] > kernel[0]) // discardListCnt is always >= 1
445  {
446  detectedObjFlag = 0;
447  break;
448  }
449  }
450 
451  if (detectedObjFlag == 1)
452  {
453  /* CUT is local peak, put its index in the output index list */
454  outIdxList[numObjOut++] = i;
455  for (j = 0; j < discardListCnt; j++)
456  {
457  /* mark all peaks from kernel as used (reserved) */
458  detList[discardList[j]].reserved = 1;
459  }
460  }
461 
462  if (numObjOut >= maxGroupedObjs)
463  {
464  goto exit;
465  }
466 
467  }/* end of if not discarded */
468  }/* end of List scan */
469 exit:
470  return numObjOut;
471 }
472 
489 void AoAProcHWA_findSinglePeak(DPU_AoAProcHWA_HwaMaxOutput * peakList,
490  uint32_t numPeaks,
491  DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput * maxPeak)
492 {
493  int32_t i;
494  uint32_t peakMax = 0;
495  uint32_t peakMaxIdx = 0;
496 
497  for (i = 0; i < numPeaks; i++)
498  {
499  if (peakList[i].peak > peakMax)
500  {
501  peakMax = peakList[i].peak;
502  peakMaxIdx = i;
503  }
504  }
505  maxPeak->iterNum = peakMaxIdx;
506  maxPeak->cellIdx = peakList[peakMaxIdx].maxInd;
507  maxPeak->peak = peakList[peakMaxIdx].peak;
508  maxPeak->reserved = 0;
509 }
510 
563 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config_EDMA
564 (
565  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
566  uint32_t srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
567  uint32_t *dstIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
568  uint32_t *srcOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
569  uint32_t *dstOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
570 
571  uint32_t *srcIn3DFFTBuffAddr,
572  uint32_t *dstIn3DFFTBuffAddr,
573  uint32_t *srcOut3DFFTBuffAddr,
574  uint32_t *dstOut3DFFTBuffAddr
575 )
576 {
577  HWA_Handle hwaHandle = aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle;
578  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
579  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
580 
581  volatile bool edmaTransComplete = false ;
582  uint16_t numBlocks;
583  uint32_t pingPongIdx;
584  uint16_t numIterations = 1; //EDMA will be reloaded per target
585 
586  EDMA_channelConfig_t config;
587  EDMA_paramConfig_t paramCfg;
588  int32_t errorCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
589  bool isEventTriggered;
590  HWA_SrcDMAConfig dmaConfig;
591  EDMA_Handle handle = res->edmaHandle;
592 
593  /* Set common fields for Params configuration */
594  paramCfg.transferCompletionCallbackFxn = NULL;
595  paramCfg.transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg = 0;
596  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.linkAddress = EDMA_NULL_LINK_ADDRESS;
597  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddressingMode = (uint8_t) EDMA3_ADDRESSING_MODE_LINEAR;
598  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddressingMode = (uint8_t) EDMA3_ADDRESSING_MODE_LINEAR;
599  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.fifoWidth = (uint8_t) EDMA3_FIFO_WIDTH_8BIT;
600  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isStaticSet = false;
601  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isEarlyCompletion = false;
602  paramCfg.transferCompletionCallbackFxn = NULL;
603  paramCfg.transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg = 0;
604 
605  /* Set a common configuration for physical input/output channels - initially set to dummy channel */
606  config.channelType = (uint8_t)EDMA3_CHANNEL_TYPE_DMA;
607  config.transferCompletionCallbackFxn = NULL;
608  config.transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg = 0;
609  memset(&config.paramSetConfig, 0, sizeof(EDMA_paramSetConfig_t));
610  config.paramSetConfig.aCount = 1;
611  config.paramSetConfig.bCount = 0;
612  config.paramSetConfig.cCount = 0;
613 
614  numBlocks = DPParams->numVirtualAnt * DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
615  for (pingPongIdx = 0; pingPongIdx < 2; pingPongIdx++)
616  {
617 
618  /************************************************************/
619  /* Physical Input channel is initially set to dummy channel */
620  /************************************************************/
621  config.channelId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel;
622  config.paramId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel;
623  config.eventQueueId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].eventQueue;
624  isEventTriggered = false;
625  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configChannel(handle, &config, isEventTriggered)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
626  {
627  goto exit;
628  }
629 
630  /************************************************************/
631  /* Physical Output channel is initially set to dummy channel */
632  /************************************************************/
633  config.channelId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
634  config.paramId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
635  config.eventQueueId = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].eventQueue;
636  isEventTriggered = true;
637  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configChannel(handle, &config, isEventTriggered)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
638  {
639  goto exit;
640  }
641 
642  /* Set EDMA Transfer type to AB type */
643  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferType = (uint8_t)EDMA3_SYNC_AB;
644  /************************/
645  /* Param set: 2D-FFT In */
646  /************************/
647  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
648  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
649  NULL);
650  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dstIn2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
651  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
652  NULL);
653  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
654  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = numBlocks;
655  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = numIterations;
656  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
657 
658  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = DPParams->numRangeBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
659  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
660 
661  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
662  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
663 
664  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
665  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
666  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel;
667  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
668  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
669 
670  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramIn,
671  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
672  {
673  goto exit;
674  }
675  /* Set EDMA Transfer type to A type */
676  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferType = (uint8_t)EDMA3_SYNC_A;
677 
678  /**********************************/
679  /* Param set: 2D-FFT Signature In */
680  /**********************************/
681  HWA_getDMAconfig(hwaHandle,
682  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + (pingPongIdx * DPParams->numTxAntennas),
683  &dmaConfig);
684 
685  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,
686  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
687  NULL);
688  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,
689  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
690  NULL);
691  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = dmaConfig.aCnt;
692  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = dmaConfig.bCnt;
693  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = dmaConfig.cCnt;
694  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = dmaConfig.bCnt;
695 
696  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
697  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
698 
699  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
700  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
701 
702  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
703  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
704 
705  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = 0;
706  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
707  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
708 
709  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature,
710  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
711  {
712  goto exit;
713  }
714 
715  /************************/
716  /* Param set: 3D-FFT In */
717  /************************/
718  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(srcIn3DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
719  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
720  NULL);
721 
722  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dstIn3DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
723  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
724  NULL);
725 
726  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = aoaHwaObj->numAntCol * aoaHwaObj->numAntRow * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
727  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = 1;
728  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = 1;
729  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
730 
731  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
732  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
733 
734  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
735  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
736 
737  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
738  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
739 
740  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel;
741  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
742  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
743 
744  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramIn,
745  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
746  {
747  goto exit;
748  }
749 
750  /**********************************/
751  /* Param set: 3D-FFT Signature In */
752  /**********************************/
753  uint32_t numDummyParams = 1; /* One Dummy param set is needed because of HWA register read issue */
754  uint32_t num2DFFTParamSets = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
755  uint32_t num3DFFTParamSets = 2 + 1 + numDummyParams;
756  uint32_t paramOffset = 0;
757 
758  uint8_t dmaTriggerSrc = res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx +
759  (AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF * num2DFFTParamSets) +
760  (pingPongIdx * num3DFFTParamSets) +
761  paramOffset;
762  HWA_getDMAconfig(hwaHandle, dmaTriggerSrc, &dmaConfig);
763 
764  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,
765  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
766  NULL);
767  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,
768  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
769  NULL);
770  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = dmaConfig.aCnt;
771  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = dmaConfig.bCnt;
772  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = dmaConfig.cCnt;
773  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = dmaConfig.bCnt;
774 
775  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
776  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
777 
778  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
779  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
780 
781  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
782  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
783 
784  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = 0;
785  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
786  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
787 
788  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle,
789  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature,
790  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
791  {
792  goto exit;
793  }
794 
795  /**********************************************/
796  /* Link Input physical channel and param sets */
797  /**********************************************/
798  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
799  (uint16_t) res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel,
800  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramIn)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
801  {
802  goto exit;
803  }
804  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
805  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramIn,
806  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
807  {
808  goto exit;
809  }
810  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
811  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature,
812  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramIn)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
813  {
814  goto exit;
815  }
816  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
817  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramIn,
818  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
819  {
820  goto exit;
821  }
822  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
823  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramInSignature,
824  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramIn)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
825  {
826  goto exit;
827  }
828  /********************************/
829  /* Bring in the first param set */
830  /********************************/
831  errorCode = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(handle,
832  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel);
833  if (errorCode != 0)
834  {
835  goto exit;
836  }
837 
838  /*********************/
839  /* 2D-FFT EDMA Out: */
840  /*********************/
841  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(srcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
842  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
843  NULL);
844  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dstOut2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
845  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
846  NULL);
847  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = (DPParams->numVirtualAnt) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
848  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = 1;
849  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = 1;
850  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
851 
852  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
853  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
854 
855  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
856  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
857 
858  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = true;
859  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = true;
860  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
861  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
862  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
863 
864  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
865  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
866  {
867  goto exit;
868  }
869 
870  /***********************************************************************************/
871  /* EDMA Out: CFAR Detection List, or the list of maximum peaks (one per elevation) */
872  /***********************************************************************************/
873  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(srcOut3DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
874  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
875  NULL);
876  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dstOut3DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx],
877  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
878  NULL);
879  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.enabled)
880  {
881  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = aoaHwaObj->maxNumExpectedPeaks *
882  sizeof(DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput);
883  }
884  else
885  {
886  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS *
887  sizeof(DPU_AoAProcHWA_HwaMaxOutput);
888  }
889  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = 1;
890  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = 1;
891  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
892 
893  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
894  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
895 
896  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
897  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
898 
899  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = true;
900  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = true;
901  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
902  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
903  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = false;
904 
905  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
906  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
907  {
908  goto exit;
909  }
910 
911  /*********************************************************/
912  /* EDMA Reads CFAR Peak Counts from FFTPEAKCNT register */
913  /*********************************************************/
914  uint32_t hwaPeakCntRegAddr;
915  HWA_getCfarPeakCntRegAddress(hwaHandle, &hwaPeakCntRegAddr);
916 
917  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(hwaPeakCntRegAddr,
918  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
919  NULL);
920  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress((uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElev2DFFTPeakCounts[pingPongIdx],
921  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
922  NULL);
923  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = sizeof(uint32_t);
924  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = 1;
925  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = 1;
926  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = 0;
927 
928  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
929  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
930 
931  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
932  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
933 
934  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
935  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
936  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
937  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
938  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
939 
940  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramPeakCnt,
941  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
942  {
943  goto exit;
944  }
945 
946  /***********************************************************/
947  /* EDMA triggers HWA to continue running */
948  /* This is is needed to mitigate HWA read register issue, */
949  /* while the its state machine is running */
950  /***********************************************************/
951  numDummyParams = 1; /* This is needed to mitigate HWA read register issue */
952  num2DFFTParamSets = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
953  num3DFFTParamSets = 2 + 1 + numDummyParams;
954  paramOffset = num3DFFTParamSets - numDummyParams;
955 
956  HWA_getDMAconfig(hwaHandle,
957  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF * num2DFFTParamSets + pingPongIdx * num3DFFTParamSets + paramOffset,
958  &dmaConfig); //ToDo: Revisit this for flexible number of antennas
959 
960  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.srcAddr,
961  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
962  NULL);
963  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationAddress = SOC_translateAddress(dmaConfig.destAddr,
964  SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA,
965  NULL);
966  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.aCount = dmaConfig.aCnt;
967  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCount = dmaConfig.bCnt;
968  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.cCount = dmaConfig.cCnt;
969  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.bCountReload = dmaConfig.bCnt;
970 
971  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceBindex = 0;
972  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationBindex = 0;
973 
974  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.sourceCindex = 0;
975  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.destinationCindex = 0;
976 
977  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
978  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateTransferInterruptEnabled = false;
979 
980  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.transferCompletionCode = res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel;
981  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
982  paramCfg.paramSetConfig.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
983 
984  if ((errorCode = EDMA_configParamSet(handle,
985  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramHwaContinue,
986  &paramCfg)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
987  {
988  goto exit;
989  }
990 
991  /***********************************************/
992  /* Link Output physical channel and param sets */
993  /***********************************************/
994  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.enabled)
995  {
996  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
997  (uint16_t) res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel,
998  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
999  {
1000  goto exit;
1001  }
1002  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
1003  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
1004  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramPeakCnt)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1005  {
1006  goto exit;
1007  }
1008  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
1009  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramPeakCnt,
1010  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramHwaContinue)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1011  {
1012  goto exit;
1013  }
1014  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
1015  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramHwaContinue,
1016  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1017  {
1018  goto exit;
1019  }
1020  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
1021  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
1022  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1023  {
1024  goto exit;
1025  }
1026  }
1027  else
1028  {
1029  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
1030  (uint16_t) res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel,
1031  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1032  {
1033  goto exit;
1034  }
1035  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
1036  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
1037  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1038  {
1039  goto exit;
1040  }
1041  if ((errorCode = EDMA_linkParamSets(handle,
1042  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_3DFFT_STAGE].paramOut,
1043  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].stage[AOAHWA_2DFFT_STAGE].paramOut)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1044  {
1045  goto exit;
1046  }
1047  }
1048  /********************************/
1049  /* Bring in the first param set */
1050  /********************************/
1051  errorCode = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(handle,
1052  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel);
1053  if (errorCode != 0)
1054  {
1055  goto exit;
1056  }
1057  }
1058 
1059 exit:
1060  return(errorCode);
1061 }
1062 
1101 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config_azimuthHeatMap_EDMA
1102 (
1103  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
1104  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
1105  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
1106  uint32_t srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
1107  uint32_t *dstIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
1108  uint32_t *srcOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
1109  uint32_t dstOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
1110  uint8_t numTxAnt
1111 )
1112 {
1113  int32_t retVal = 0;
1114  volatile bool edmaTransComplete = false ;
1115  uint16_t numBlocks;
1116  DPEDMA_ChainingCfg chainingCfg;
1117  DPEDMA_syncABCfg syncABCfg;
1118  uint32_t pingPongIdx;
1119  uint16_t numIterations = DPParams->numRangeBins/AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF;
1120  bool isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled = false;
1121  bool isFinalTransferCompletionEnabled = true;
1122 
1123  numBlocks = (DPParams->numVirtualAnt) * DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
1124  for (pingPongIdx = 0; pingPongIdx < AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF; pingPongIdx++)
1125  {
1126  /************************************************************/
1127  /* EDMA In: load to HWA all antennas, azimuth and elevation */
1128  /************************************************************/
1129 
1130  /* Copy one Range bin to HWA memory */
1131  chainingCfg.chainingChan = res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].inSignature.channel;
1132  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
1133  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
1134 
1135  syncABCfg.srcAddress = srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr + pingPongIdx * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1136  syncABCfg.destAddress = dstIn2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx];
1137  syncABCfg.aCount = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1138  syncABCfg.bCount = numBlocks;
1139  syncABCfg.cCount = numIterations;
1140  syncABCfg.srcBIdx = DPParams->numRangeBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1141  syncABCfg.dstBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1142  syncABCfg.srcCIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF;
1143  syncABCfg.dstCIdx = 0;
1144 
1145  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(res->edmaHandle,
1146  &res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in,
1147  &chainingCfg,
1148  &syncABCfg,
1149  false,//isEventTriggered
1150  false, //isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled
1151  false,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
1152  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
1153  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
1154  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1155  {
1156  goto exit;
1157  }
1158 
1159  /* Copy one hot signature to trigger HWA 2D FFT */
1160  retVal = DPEDMAHWA_configOneHotSignature(res->edmaHandle,
1161  &res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].inSignature,
1162  hwaHandle,
1163  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + (pingPongIdx * numTxAnt),
1164  false);
1165  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1166  {
1167  goto exit;
1168  }
1169 
1170  /**************/
1171  /* EDMA Out: */
1172  /**************/
1173 
1174  /* Copy one Range bin to HWA memory */
1175  chainingCfg.chainingChan = res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel;
1176  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
1177  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = false;
1178 
1179  syncABCfg.srcAddress = srcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx];
1180  syncABCfg.destAddress = dstOut2DFFTBuffAddr + pingPongIdx * (DPParams->numVirtualAnt) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) ;
1181  syncABCfg.aCount = (DPParams->numVirtualAnt) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1182  syncABCfg.bCount = 1;
1183  syncABCfg.cCount = numIterations;
1184  syncABCfg.srcBIdx = 0;
1185  syncABCfg.dstBIdx = 0;
1186  syncABCfg.srcCIdx = 0;
1187  syncABCfg.dstCIdx = (DPParams->numVirtualAnt) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF;
1188 
1189  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(res->edmaHandle,
1190  &res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].out,
1191  &chainingCfg,
1192  &syncABCfg,
1193  true,//isEventTriggered
1194  isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled,
1195  isFinalTransferCompletionEnabled,
1196  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
1197  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
1198 
1199  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1200  {
1201  goto exit;
1202  }
1203  }
1204 
1205 exit:
1206  return(retVal);
1207 }
1208 
1225 int32_t AoAProcHWA_cfgAndTrigger_EDMA_2DFFT(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1226  uint32_t detObjIdx,
1227  uint8_t pingPongIdx)
1228 {
1229  int32_t retVal;
1230  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1231  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
1232  cmplx16ImRe_t *radarCubeBase = (cmplx16ImRe_t *)res->radarCube.data;
1233  uint32_t dopplerBinSize = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * (DPParams->numVirtualAnt);
1234  uint32_t srcBuffAddr;
1235 
1236  /* EDMA In Source address in radar cube */
1237  srcBuffAddr = (uint32_t) (&radarCubeBase[res->cfarRngDopSnrList[detObjIdx].rangeIdx]);
1238  retVal = EDMA_setSourceAddress(res->edmaHandle,
1239  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel,
1240  SOC_translateAddress(srcBuffAddr, SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA, NULL));
1241  if (retVal != 0)
1242  {
1243  goto exit;
1244  }
1245 
1246  /* EDMA Out Source address in M2 or M3 */
1247  srcBuffAddr = aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[pingPongIdx] +
1248  res->cfarRngDopSnrList[detObjIdx].dopplerIdx * dopplerBinSize;
1249  retVal = EDMA_setSourceAddress(res->edmaHandle,
1250  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel,
1251  SOC_translateAddress(srcBuffAddr, SOC_TranslateAddr_Dir_TO_EDMA, NULL));
1252  if (retVal != 0)
1253  {
1254  goto exit;
1255  }
1256 
1257  /* Trigger single bin 2D FFT */
1258  retVal = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(res->edmaHandle,
1259  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel);
1260  if (retVal != 0)
1261  {
1262  goto exit;
1263  }
1264 exit:
1265  return retVal;
1266 }
1267 
1281 int32_t AoAProcHWA_trigger_EDMA_3DFFT(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1282  uint8_t pingPongIdx)
1283 {
1284  int32_t retVal;
1285  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1286 
1287  /* Trigger 3D-FFT */
1288  retVal = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(res->edmaHandle,
1289  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chIn.channel);
1290 
1291  return retVal;
1292 }
1293 
1322 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config_HWA
1323 (
1324  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1325  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
1326  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
1327  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
1328  uint32_t *hwaMemBankAddr,
1329  uint32_t numAzimuthBins
1330 )
1331 {
1332  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
1333  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
1334  int32_t retVal = 0;
1335  int32_t i;
1336  uint32_t pingPongidx;
1337  int32_t paramSetCurrentIdx;
1338  uint8_t dmaTriggerDest;
1339  uint32_t numElevationBins = numAzimuthBins;
1340  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx = res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx;
1341  uint32_t windowOffset = res->hwaCfg.winRamOffset;
1342  uint8_t winSym = res->hwaCfg.winSym;
1343  uint32_t numDopplerChirps = DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
1344  uint32_t numDopplerBins = DPParams->numDopplerBins;
1345  uint8_t numRxAnt = DPParams->numRxAntennas;
1346  uint8_t numTxAnt = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
1347  uint8_t numVirtualAnt = DPParams->numVirtualAnt;
1348 
1349  uint16_t hwaMemAzimSource[2];
1350  uint16_t hwaMemAzimDest[2];
1351 
1352  hwaMemAzimSource[0] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[0]);
1353  hwaMemAzimSource[1] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[1]);
1354  hwaMemAzimDest[0] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[2]);
1355  hwaMemAzimDest[1] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[3]);
1356 
1357  /* Disable the HWA */
1358  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
1359  if (retVal != 0)
1360  {
1361  goto exit;
1362  }
1363 
1364  /**********************************************************/
1365  /******************* Configure 2D-FFT *********************/
1366  /**********************************************************/
1367  paramSetCurrentIdx = paramSetStartIdx;
1368  for (pingPongidx =0; pingPongidx < 2; pingPongidx++)
1369  {
1370  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
1371 
1372  /* Program 2D FFT */
1373  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = paramSetCurrentIdx;
1374  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
1375 
1376  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numDopplerChirps - 1; //size in samples - 1
1377 
1378  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); //
1379  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numRxAnt - 1;
1380  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); //should be dont care
1381  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
1382  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
1383  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //complex data
1384  hwaParamCfg.source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
1385  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
1386  hwaParamCfg.source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
1387  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
1388  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
1389  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
1390 
1391  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numDopplerBins -1;
1392  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = numVirtualAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1393  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) ; //should be dont care
1394  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //same as input - complex
1395  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
1396  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //same as input - signed
1397  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
1398  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8 ;
1399  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
1400 
1401  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
1402  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_floorLog2(numDopplerBins);
1403  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3FF; //LSB fftSize bits are relevant
1404  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
1405  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
1406  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = windowOffset; //start of window RAM
1407  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = winSym;
1408  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0;
1409  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;
1410  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT;
1411 
1412  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1413 
1414  for (i = 0; i < numTxAnt; i++)
1415  {
1416  if (i == 0)
1417  {
1418  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
1419  }
1420  else
1421  {
1422  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1423  }
1424  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx] + i * numDopplerChirps * numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
1425  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx] + i * numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
1426  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, (uint8_t) paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1427  if (retVal != 0)
1428  {
1429  goto exit;
1430  }
1431 
1432  /* Disable DMA/interrupt hookup to all except the last one */
1433  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1434  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1435  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1436  if (retVal != 0)
1437  {
1438  goto exit;
1439  }
1440  /* Output interrupt to DMA only by last param set */
1441  if (i == (numTxAnt-1))
1442  {
1443  /* Last param set: enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out */
1444  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(hwaHandle,
1445  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongidx].chOut.channel,
1446  &dmaTriggerDest);
1447  if (retVal != 0)
1448  {
1449  goto exit;
1450  }
1451  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
1452  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaTriggerDest; /* EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out */
1453  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
1454  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1455  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1456  &paramISRConfig);
1457  if (retVal != 0)
1458  {
1459  goto exit;
1460  }
1461  }
1462  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1463  }
1464  }
1465 
1466  /**********************************************************/
1467  /******************* Configure 3D-FFT *********************/
1468  /**********************************************************/
1469  for (pingPongidx =0; pingPongidx < 2; pingPongidx++)
1470  {
1471  /**********************************************************/
1472  /************** Param set computes the azimuth-FFT ********/
1473  /**********************************************************/
1474  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1475  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = paramSetCurrentIdx;
1476  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
1477 
1478  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx];
1479  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = aoaHwaObj->numAntCol - 1;
1480  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1481  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = aoaHwaObj->numAntCol * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1482  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = (aoaHwaObj->numAntRow) - 1;
1483  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1484  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
1485 
1486  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1487  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
1488  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(numAzimuthBins);//assumes power of 2;
1489  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
1490  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x1;
1491 
1492  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx];
1493  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numAzimuthBins-1;
1494  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1495  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1496  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1497  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8;
1498 
1499  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1500  if (retVal != 0)
1501  {
1502  goto exit;
1503  }
1504  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1505  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1506  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1507  if (retVal != 0)
1508  {
1509  goto exit;
1510  }
1511  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1512 
1513  /**************************************************************/
1514  /************** Param set computes the elevation-FFT **********/
1515  /**************************************************************/
1516  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1517  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1518 
1519  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx];
1520  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = aoaHwaObj->numAntRow - 1;
1521  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1522  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1523  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numAzimuthBins-1;
1524  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1525  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
1526 
1527  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1528  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
1529  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(numElevationBins);//assumes power of 2;
1530  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
1531  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x1;
1532 
1533  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx];
1534  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numElevationBins - 1;
1535  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1536  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1537  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1538  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8;
1539 
1540  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1541  if (retVal != 0)
1542  {
1543  goto exit;
1544  }
1545  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1546  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1547  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1548  if (retVal != 0)
1549  {
1550  goto exit;
1551  }
1552 
1553  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1554 
1555  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.enabled)
1556  {
1557  /*********************************************/
1558  /***** Param set - CFAR find MAXIMA ******/
1559  /*********************************************/
1560  uint16_t guardLen;
1561  uint16_t winLen;
1562  uint8_t noiseDivShift;
1563  uint8_t cyclicMode = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_ENABLE;
1564  guardLen = 0;
1565  winLen = 2;
1566  noiseDivShift = 2;
1567 
1568  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1569  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1570 
1571  //Cyclic mode
1572  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = (numAzimuthBins - 1) + (guardLen + winLen) + (guardLen + winLen);
1573  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = numAzimuthBins - (guardLen + winLen);
1574  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = mathUtils_floorLog2(numAzimuthBins);
1575 
1576  if (aoaHwaObj->cfarDirection == AOAHWA_CFAR_IN_AZIMUTH_DIRECTION)
1577  {
1578  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
1579  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(uint32_t); //Elevation FFT size is same as azimuth FFT size
1580  }
1581  else
1582  {
1583  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(uint32_t);
1584  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t); //Elevation FFT size is same as azimuth FFT size
1585  }
1586  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numAzimuthBins - 1;
1587  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX;
1588  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx];
1589  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;//8;
1590  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1591 
1592  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx];
1593  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = aoaHwaObj->maxNumExpectedPeaks - 1;
1594  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX;
1595  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_32BIT;
1596  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput);
1597  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = 0; //don't care
1598  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8;
1599 
1600  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_CFAR;
1601  //cfarInpMode = x, cfarLogMode = x, cfarAbsMode = xxb
1602  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.operMode = HWA_CFAR_OPER_MODE_MAG_SQR_INPUT_COMPLEX;//HWA_CFAR_OPER_MODE_MAG_INPUT_COMPLEX;
1603  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.peakGroupEn = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_ENABLE;
1604  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numGuardCells = guardLen;
1605  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.nAvgDivFactor = noiseDivShift;
1606  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.cyclicModeEn = cyclicMode;
1607  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.nAvgMode = HWA_NOISE_AVG_MODE_CFAR_CA;
1608  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numNoiseSamplesRight = winLen >> 1;
1609  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.numNoiseSamplesLeft = winLen >> 1;
1610  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.cfarMode.outputMode = HWA_CFAR_OUTPUT_MODE_I_PEAK_IDX_Q_CUT;//HWA_CFAR_OUTPUT_MODE_I_nAVG_ALL_Q_CUT;//HWA_CFAR_OUTPUT_MODE_I_PEAK_IDX_Q_CUT;
1611 
1612  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1613  if (retVal != 0)
1614  {
1615  goto exit;
1616  }
1617 
1618  /* Enable the DMA hookup to EDMA */
1619  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(hwaHandle,
1620  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongidx].chOut.channel,
1621  &dmaTriggerDest);
1622  if (retVal != 0)
1623  {
1624  goto exit;
1625  }
1626  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
1627  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaTriggerDest; /* EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out */
1628  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
1629  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1630  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1631  &paramISRConfig);
1632  if (retVal != 0)
1633  {
1634  goto exit;
1635  }
1636  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1637 
1638  /*******************************************************************/
1639  /* Insert DUMMY Param set. This is fix for HWA register read issue */
1640  /*******************************************************************/
1641  memset((void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1642 
1643  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
1644  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = paramSetCurrentIdx;
1645  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_NONE;
1646  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1647  if (retVal != 0)
1648  {
1649  goto exit;
1650  }
1651  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1652  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1653  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1654  if (retVal != 0)
1655  {
1656  goto exit;
1657  }
1658  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1659 
1660  }
1661  else
1662  {
1663  /***************************************************************/
1664  /*** Param set - Search maximums in 2D angle FFT - AZIMUTH *****/
1665  /***************************************************************/
1666  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1667  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1668 
1669  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numAzimuthBins - 1;
1670  {
1671  /*Peak search in Azimuth direction*/
1672  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
1673  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numAzimuthBins * sizeof(uint32_t);
1674  }
1675  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numAzimuthBins - 1;
1676  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX;
1677  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx];
1678  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
1679  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
1680 
1681  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx];
1682  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = 4095;
1683  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX;
1684  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_32BIT;
1685  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = 8;
1686  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = 8; //don't care
1687  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8;
1688 
1689  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT;
1690  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1691  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 0;
1692  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(numElevationBins);//assumes power of 2;
1693  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
1694  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0;
1695  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_MAX_STATS;
1696  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_ONLY_ENABLED;
1697 
1698  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1699  if (retVal != 0)
1700  {
1701  goto exit;
1702  }
1703 
1704  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1705  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1706  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1707  if (retVal != 0)
1708  {
1709  goto exit;
1710  }
1711  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1712 
1713  /*******************************************************************/
1714  /* Insert DUMMY Param set. This is fix for HWA register read issue */
1715  /*******************************************************************/
1716  memset((void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
1717 
1718  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1719  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_NONE;
1720  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1721  if (retVal != 0)
1722  {
1723  goto exit;
1724  }
1725 
1726  /* Enable the DMA hookup to EDMA */
1727  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(hwaHandle,
1728  res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongidx].chOut.channel,
1729  &dmaTriggerDest);
1730  if (retVal != 0)
1731  {
1732  goto exit;
1733  }
1734  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
1735  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaTriggerDest; /* EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out */
1736  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
1737  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1738  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1739  &paramISRConfig);
1740  if (retVal != 0)
1741  {
1742  goto exit;
1743  }
1744 
1745  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1746  }
1747 
1748  }
1749 exit:
1750  return (retVal);
1751 }
1752 
1778 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config_azimuthHeatMap_HWA
1779 (
1780  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
1781  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
1782  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
1783  uint32_t *hwaMemBankAddr,
1784  uint8_t numTxAnt
1785 )
1786 {
1787  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
1788  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
1789  int32_t retVal = 0;
1790  int32_t i;
1791  uint32_t pingPongidx;
1792  int32_t paramSetCurrentIdx;
1793  uint8_t dmaTriggerDest;
1794  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx = res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx;
1795  uint32_t windowOffset = res->hwaCfg.winRamOffset;
1796  uint8_t winSym = res->hwaCfg.winSym;
1797  uint32_t numDopplerChirps = DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
1798  uint32_t numDopplerBins = DPParams->numDopplerBins;
1799  uint8_t numRxAnt = DPParams->numRxAntennas;
1800  uint8_t numVirtualAnt = DPParams->numVirtualAnt;
1801  uint16_t hwaMemAzimSource[2];
1802  uint16_t hwaMemAzimDest[2];
1803  hwaMemAzimSource[0] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[0]);
1804  hwaMemAzimSource[1] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[1]);
1805  hwaMemAzimDest[0] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[2]);
1806  hwaMemAzimDest[1] = ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[3]);
1807  uint32_t numOutSamplesPerFft = 1;
1808 
1809  /* Disable the HWA */
1810  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
1811  if (retVal != 0)
1812  {
1813  goto exit;
1814  }
1815 
1816  /**********************************************************/
1817  /******************* Configure 2D-FFT *********************/
1818  /**********************************************************/
1819  paramSetCurrentIdx = paramSetStartIdx;
1820  for (pingPongidx =0; pingPongidx < 2; pingPongidx++)
1821  {
1822  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
1823 
1824  /* Program 2D FFT */
1825  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = paramSetCurrentIdx;
1826  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
1827 
1828  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numDopplerChirps - 1; //size in samples - 1
1829 
1830  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); //
1831  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numRxAnt - 1;
1832  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); //should be dont care
1833  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
1834  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
1835  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //complex data
1836  hwaParamCfg.source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
1837  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
1838  hwaParamCfg.source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
1839  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
1840  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
1841  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
1842 
1843  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numOutSamplesPerFft -1;
1844  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = (numVirtualAnt) * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t);
1845  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) ; //should be dont care
1846  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //same as input - complex
1847  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
1848  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //same as input - signed
1849  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
1850  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8 ;
1851  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
1852 
1853  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
1854  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_floorLog2(numDopplerBins);
1855  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3FF; //LSB fftSize bits are relevant
1856  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
1857  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
1858  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = windowOffset; //start of window RAM
1859  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = winSym;
1860  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0;
1861  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;
1862  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT;
1863 
1864  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
1865 
1866  for (i = 0; i < numTxAnt; i++)
1867  {
1868  if (i == 0)
1869  {
1870  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
1871  }
1872  else
1873  {
1874  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
1875  }
1876 
1877  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaMemAzimSource[pingPongidx] + i * numDopplerChirps * numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
1878  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaMemAzimDest[pingPongidx] + i * numRxAnt * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
1879  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, (uint8_t) paramSetCurrentIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1880  if (retVal != 0)
1881  {
1882  goto exit;
1883  }
1884 
1885  /* Disable DMA/interrupt hookup to all except the last one */
1886  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1887  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1888  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1889  if (retVal != 0)
1890  {
1891  goto exit;
1892  }
1893  /* Output interrupt to DMA only by last param set */
1894  if (i == (numTxAnt-1))
1895  {
1896  /* Last param set: enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out */
1897  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(hwaHandle,
1898  res->edmaHwa[pingPongidx].out.channel,
1899  &dmaTriggerDest);
1900  if (retVal != 0)
1901  {
1902  goto exit;
1903  }
1904  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
1905  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaTriggerDest; /* EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out */
1906  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
1907  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1908  paramSetCurrentIdx,
1909  &paramISRConfig);
1910  if (retVal != 0)
1911  {
1912  goto exit;
1913  }
1914  }
1915  paramSetCurrentIdx++;
1916  }
1917  }
1918 
1919 exit:
1920  return (retVal);
1921 }
1922 
1942 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config_HWA_common (HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
1943  uint16_t numLoops,
1944  uint16_t paramStartIdx,
1945  uint16_t numParams)
1946 {
1947  int32_t errCode = 0;
1948  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
1949 
1950  /* Disable the HWA */
1951  errCode = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
1952  if (errCode != 0)
1953  {
1954  goto exit;
1955  }
1956 
1957  /***********************/
1958  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
1959  /***********************/
1960  /* Config Common Registers */
1961  hwaCommonConfig.configMask =
1962  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
1963  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
1964  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
1965  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
1966  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD |
1967  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_CFARTHRESHOLDSCALE;
1968 
1969  /* Threshold is set to one, since we are searching for maximum peaks using CFAR with peak grouping enabled */
1970  hwaCommonConfig.cfarConfig.cfarThresholdScale = 16;
1971 
1972  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = numLoops;
1973  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = paramStartIdx;
1974  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = paramStartIdx + (numParams-1);
1975 
1976  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
1977  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
1978 
1979  errCode = HWA_configCommon(hwaHandle, &hwaCommonConfig);
1980 exit:
1981  return (errCode);
1982 }
1983 
2000 int32_t AoAProcHWA_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(SemaphoreP_Handle semaHandle)
2001 {
2002  return((int32_t) SemaphoreP_pend(semaHandle, SemaphoreP_WAIT_FOREVER));
2003 }
2004 
2033 uint32_t AoAProcHWA_XYZestimationAoA2D
2034 (
2035  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
2036  uint8_t pingPongIdx,
2037  uint32_t objInIdx,
2038  uint32_t objOutIdx,
2039  uint32_t numDetPeaksAzimElev,
2040  int32_t dopplerIdx
2041 )
2042 {
2043  float temp;
2044  float Wx, Wz;
2045  float range;
2046  float limitScale;
2047  float x, y, z;
2048  uint32_t numAngleBins = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS;
2049  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
2050  DPIF_CFARDetList *objIn = res->cfarRngDopSnrList;
2051  DPIF_PointCloudCartesian *objOut = res->detObjOut;
2052  DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo *objOutSideInfo = res->detObjOutSideInfo;
2053  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *params = &aoaHwaObj->params;
2054  DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput *detList = (DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput *) aoaHwaObj->highestPeaksList;
2055  int32_t i;
2056  int32_t azimIdx, elevIdx;
2057 
2058  range = objIn[objInIdx].rangeIdx * params->rangeStep;
2059 
2060  /* Compensate for range bias */
2061  range -= aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rangeBias;
2062  if (range < 0)
2063  {
2064  range = 0;
2065  }
2066 
2067  for (i = 0; i < numDetPeaksAzimElev; i++)
2068  {
2069  if (aoaHwaObj->cfarDirection == AOAHWA_CFAR_IN_AZIMUTH_DIRECTION)
2070  {
2071  azimIdx = detList[i].cellIdx;
2072  elevIdx = detList[i].iterNum;
2073  }
2074  else
2075  {
2076  elevIdx = detList[i].cellIdx;
2077  azimIdx = detList[i].iterNum;
2078  }
2079 
2080  if(azimIdx > (numAngleBins/2 -1))
2081  {
2082  azimIdx = azimIdx - numAngleBins;
2083  }
2084 
2085  if(elevIdx > (numAngleBins/2 -1))
2086  {
2087  elevIdx = elevIdx - numAngleBins;
2088  }
2089 
2090  Wx = 2 * (float) azimIdx / numAngleBins;
2091 
2092  x = range * Wx;
2093 
2094  Wz = 2 * (float) elevIdx / numAngleBins;;
2095 
2096  /* Check if it is within configured field of view */
2097  if((Wz < aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minElevationSineVal) ||
2098  (Wz > aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxElevationSineVal))
2099  {
2100  goto exit;
2101  }
2102 
2103  z = range * Wz;
2104  res->detObjElevationAngle[objOutIdx] = Wz;
2105  limitScale = sqrt(1 - Wz*Wz);
2106 
2107  /* Check if it is within configured field of view */
2108  if((Wx < (limitScale * aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minAzimuthSineVal)) ||
2109  (Wx > (limitScale * aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxAzimuthSineVal)))
2110  {
2111  goto exit;
2112  }
2113 
2114  temp = range*range -x*x -z*z;
2115  if (temp > 0)
2116  {
2117  y = sqrt(temp);
2118  }
2119  else
2120  {
2121  goto exit;
2122  }
2123 
2124  objOut[objOutIdx].x = x;
2125  objOut[objOutIdx].y = y;
2126  objOut[objOutIdx].z = z;
2127 
2128  objOut[objOutIdx].velocity = params->dopplerStep * dopplerIdx;
2129  objOutSideInfo[objOutIdx].noise = objIn[objInIdx].noise;
2130  objOutSideInfo[objOutIdx].snr = objIn[objInIdx].snr;
2131  res->detObj2dAzimIdx[objOutIdx] = azimIdx;
2132 
2133  objOutIdx++;
2134  }
2135 exit:
2136  return (objOutIdx);
2137 }
2138 
2157 static void aoaHwa_dopplerComp
2158 (
2159  cmplx16ImRe_t *in,
2160  cmplx16ImRe_t *out,
2161  float Cos,
2162  float Sin
2163 )
2164 {
2165  float yRe, yIm;
2166 
2167  /* Rotate symbol (correct the phase) */
2168  yRe = in->real * Cos + in->imag * Sin;
2169  yIm = in->imag * Cos - in->real * Sin;
2170 
2171  out->real = (int16_t) yRe;
2172  out->imag = (int16_t) yIm;
2173 }
2174 
2193 static float AoAProcHWA_3DFFTGainCalc(uint32_t *srcPtr, uint32_t numAnt)
2194 {
2195  cmplx16ImRe_t *x = (cmplx16ImRe_t *) srcPtr;
2196  uint32_t i;
2197  float magSq = 0;
2198  float gain = 1.;
2199 
2200  for (i = 0; i < numAnt; i++)
2201  {
2202  magSq += (float)x[i].real * (float)x[i].real + (float)x[i].imag * (float)x[i].imag;
2203  }
2204  if (magSq > 0.)
2205  {
2206  gain = sqrt(numAnt * 1e6 / magSq);
2207  }
2208 
2209  return gain;
2210 }
2211 
2237 static void AoAProcHWA_dopplerCompensation
2238 (
2239  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
2240  uint32_t *srcPtr,
2241  DPIF_CFARDetList *cfarOutList,
2242  uint32_t *dstPtr,
2243  uint32_t numTxAnt,
2244  uint32_t numRxAnt,
2245  uint32_t numDopplerBins
2246 )
2247 {
2248  uint32_t rxAntIdx;
2249  uint32_t virtAntIdx;
2250  uint32_t txAntIdx;
2251  uint16_t dopplerIdx;
2252  int32_t dopplerSignIdx;
2253  float dopplerCompensationIdx;
2254  float Cos,Sin,temp;
2255  uint32_t numOutputSymbols;
2256  uint32_t rowIdx, azimIdx, outIdx;
2257  uint32_t usymb;
2258  cmplx16ImRe_t *symb = (cmplx16ImRe_t *) &usymb;
2259  int32_t symbVal;
2260  float gain;
2261 
2262  /* Adjust gain of the input symbols to 2D-FFT to increase output level of
2263  weak targets and mitigate HWA CFAR peak grouping issue in xwr18xx (bug fixed
2264  in xwr68xx ES2.0) */
2265  gain = AoAProcHWA_3DFFTGainCalc(srcPtr, numTxAnt*numRxAnt);
2266 
2267  dopplerIdx = cfarOutList->dopplerIdx;
2268  dopplerSignIdx = (int32_t) dopplerIdx;
2269  if(dopplerIdx >= (numDopplerBins/2))
2270  {
2271  dopplerSignIdx = dopplerSignIdx - (int32_t) numDopplerBins;
2272  }
2273 
2274  numOutputSymbols = aoaHwaObj->numAntCol * aoaHwaObj->numAntRow;
2275 
2276  memset(dstPtr, 0, numOutputSymbols * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t));
2277  virtAntIdx = 0;
2278  /* transfer data corresponding to the first chirp */
2279  for(rxAntIdx = 0; rxAntIdx < numRxAnt; rxAntIdx++)
2280  {
2281  rowIdx = aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[virtAntIdx].rowIdx;
2282  azimIdx = aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[virtAntIdx].colIdx;
2283  outIdx = rowIdx * aoaHwaObj->numAntCol + azimIdx;
2284 
2285  usymb = srcPtr[virtAntIdx];
2286  symbVal = (int32_t) (gain * symb->real);
2287  MATHUTILS_SATURATE16(symbVal);
2288  symb->real = symbVal;
2289  symbVal = (int32_t) (gain * symb->imag);
2290  MATHUTILS_SATURATE16(symbVal);
2291  symb->imag = symbVal;
2292 
2293  dstPtr[outIdx] = usymb;
2294  virtAntIdx++;
2295  }
2296 
2297  if(numTxAnt > 1)
2298  {
2299  /* transfer data corresponding to the remaining TDM chirps */
2300  dopplerCompensationIdx = (dopplerSignIdx) / (float)numTxAnt;
2301  Cos = cos(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
2302  Sin = sin(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
2303 
2304  for(txAntIdx=1; txAntIdx < numTxAnt; txAntIdx++)
2305  {
2306  for(rxAntIdx = 0; rxAntIdx < numRxAnt; rxAntIdx++)
2307  {
2308  rowIdx = aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[virtAntIdx].rowIdx;
2309  azimIdx = aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[virtAntIdx].colIdx;
2310  outIdx = rowIdx * aoaHwaObj->numAntCol + azimIdx;
2311 
2312  usymb = srcPtr[virtAntIdx];
2313  symbVal = (int32_t) (gain * symb->real);
2314  MATHUTILS_SATURATE16(symbVal);
2315  symb->real = symbVal;
2316  symbVal = (int32_t) (gain * symb->imag);
2317  MATHUTILS_SATURATE16(symbVal);
2318  symb->imag = symbVal;
2319 
2320  aoaHwa_dopplerComp((cmplx16ImRe_t *)symb,
2321  (cmplx16ImRe_t *)&dstPtr[outIdx],
2322  Cos,
2323  Sin);
2324  virtAntIdx++;
2325  }
2326 
2327  if (txAntIdx < (numTxAnt-1))
2328  {
2329  /* Increment Doppler phase shift */
2330  temp = Cos * Cos - Sin * Sin;
2331  Sin = 2 * Cos * Sin;
2332  Cos = temp;
2333  }
2334 
2335  }
2336  }
2337 }
2338 
2359 static uint32_t AoAProcHWA_angleEstimationAzimElev
2360 (
2361  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
2362  uint32_t objInIdx,
2363  uint8_t pingPongIdx,
2364  uint32_t objOutIdx
2365 )
2366 {
2367  //uint32_t objInHwaIdx;
2368  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
2369  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
2370  DPIF_CFARDetList *objIn = res->cfarRngDopSnrList;
2371 
2372  uint32_t numDetPeaksAzimElev;
2373 
2374  uint16_t maxNumObj = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
2375  int16_t dopplerSignIdx;
2376  uint16_t numDopplerBins = DPParams->numDopplerBins;
2377 
2378  if (objOutIdx >= maxNumObj)
2379  {
2380  return objOutIdx;
2381  }
2382 
2383  dopplerSignIdx = MATHUTILS_FFT_IDX_TO_SIGNED(objIn[objInIdx].dopplerIdx, numDopplerBins);
2384 
2385  /* Limit the number of detected peaks by CFAR (the number read from HWA FFTCOUNT register)
2386  * to the actual number of peaks saved by CFAR to HWA memory and copied to local core memory*/
2387  if (aoaHwaObj->azimElev2DFFTPeakCounts[pingPongIdx] > aoaHwaObj->maxNumExpectedPeaks)
2388  {
2389  aoaHwaObj->azimElev2DFFTPeakCounts[pingPongIdx] = aoaHwaObj->maxNumExpectedPeaks;
2390  }
2391 
2392  if(aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.enabled)
2393  {
2394  numDetPeaksAzimElev = AoAProcHWA_peakGrouping(
2395  aoaHwaObj->hwaDetectedPeaksList[pingPongIdx],
2396  aoaHwaObj->azimElev2DFFTPeakCounts[pingPongIdx],
2397  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_NUM_GROUPED_TARGETS_PER_RANGE_DOPPLER_PT,
2398  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS,
2399  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.multiPeakThrsScal,
2400  (uint16_t *) aoaHwaObj->groupedPeakIdxList);
2401  aoaHwaObj->azimElev2DFFTGroupedPeakCounts[pingPongIdx] = numDetPeaksAzimElev;
2402 
2403  numDetPeaksAzimElev = AoAProcHWA_SelectMaxPeaks(aoaHwaObj->hwaDetectedPeaksList[pingPongIdx],
2404  aoaHwaObj->groupedPeakIdxList,
2405  numDetPeaksAzimElev,
2406  aoaHwaObj->highestPeaksList,
2407  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.multiPeakThrsScal,
2408  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_NUM_EXPORTED_TARGETS_PER_RANGE_DOPPLER_PT);
2409  aoaHwaObj->azimElev2DFFTMaxPeakCounts[pingPongIdx] = numDetPeaksAzimElev;
2410  }
2411  else
2412  {
2413  /* Find single maximum peak */
2414  AoAProcHWA_findSinglePeak((DPU_AoAProcHWA_HwaMaxOutput *) aoaHwaObj->hwaDetectedPeaksList[pingPongIdx],
2415  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS,
2416  aoaHwaObj->highestPeaksList);
2417  numDetPeaksAzimElev = 1;
2418  aoaHwaObj->azimElev2DFFTGroupedPeakCounts[pingPongIdx] = numDetPeaksAzimElev;
2419  aoaHwaObj->azimElev2DFFTMaxPeakCounts[pingPongIdx] = numDetPeaksAzimElev;
2420  }
2421 
2422  objOutIdx = AoAProcHWA_XYZestimationAoA2D(aoaHwaObj,
2423  pingPongIdx,
2424  objInIdx,
2425  objOutIdx,
2426  numDetPeaksAzimElev,
2427  dopplerSignIdx);
2428 
2429  return(objOutIdx);
2430 }
2431 
2448 int32_t AoAProcHWA_waitEdma(AOAHwaObj * aoaHwaObj,
2449  uint8_t channel)
2450 {
2451  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
2452  int32_t errCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
2453 
2454  /* wait until transfer done */
2455  volatile bool isTransferDone;
2456  do {
2457  if ((errCode = EDMA_isTransferComplete(res->edmaHandle,
2458  channel,
2459  (bool *)&isTransferDone)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
2460  {
2461  break;
2462  }
2463  } while (isTransferDone == false);
2464 
2465  return errCode;
2466 }
2467 
2488 int32_t AoAProcHWA_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatmap(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
2489  volatile uint32_t *waitTimeLocal)
2490 {
2491  volatile uint32_t startTime1;
2492  int32_t retVal = 0;
2493  uint16_t numParams;
2494  HWA_Handle hwaHandle;
2495  cmplx16ImRe_t *radarCubeBase;
2496  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res;
2497  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams;
2498  uint8_t numTxAnt;
2499  uint8_t pingPongIdx;
2500  int32_t i;
2501 
2502  res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
2503  DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
2504  radarCubeBase = (cmplx16ImRe_t *)res->radarCube.data;
2505  hwaHandle = aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle;
2506 
2507  numTxAnt = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
2508 
2509  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config_azimuthHeatMap_HWA(hwaHandle,
2510  res,
2511  DPParams,
2512  aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr,
2513  numTxAnt);
2514  if (retVal != 0)
2515  {
2516  goto exit;
2517  }
2518 
2519  numParams = numTxAnt * AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF;
2520  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config_HWA_common (hwaHandle,
2521  DPParams->numRangeBins / AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF, //numLoops,
2522  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, //paramStartIdx,
2523  numParams);
2524  if (retVal != 0)
2525  {
2526  goto exit;
2527  }
2528 
2529  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config_azimuthHeatMap_EDMA(hwaHandle,
2530  res,
2531  DPParams,
2532  (uint32_t) radarCubeBase,
2533  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
2534  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
2535  (uint32_t) res->azimuthStaticHeatMap,
2536  numTxAnt);
2537  if (retVal != 0)
2538  {
2539  goto exit;
2540  }
2541 
2542  /* Enable the HWA */
2543  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 1);
2544  if (retVal != 0)
2545  {
2546  goto exit;
2547  }
2548 
2549  /* Trigger first two range bins 2D FFT */
2550  pingPongIdx = 0;
2551  retVal = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(res->edmaHandle,
2552  res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel);
2553  pingPongIdx = 1;
2554  retVal = EDMA_startDmaTransfer(res->edmaHandle,
2555  res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel);
2556 
2557  if (retVal != 0)
2558  {
2559  goto exit;
2560  }
2561 
2562  /* Wait until HWA done with FFT */
2563  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2564  AoAProcHWA_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
2565  *waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2566 
2567  /* Wait until EDMA output is done */
2568  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2569  pingPongIdx = 0;
2570  retVal = AoAProcHWA_waitEdma(aoaHwaObj,
2571  res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel);
2572  pingPongIdx = 1;
2573  retVal = AoAProcHWA_waitEdma(aoaHwaObj,
2574  res->edmaHwa[pingPongIdx].in.channel);
2575  *waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2576  if (retVal != 0)
2577  {
2578  goto exit;
2579  }
2580 
2581  /* Disable the HWA */
2582  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
2583  if (retVal != 0)
2584  {
2585  goto exit;
2586  }
2587 
2588  /* Rx channel gain/phase offset compensation */
2589  for (i = 0; i < DPParams->numRangeBins; i++)
2590  {
2591  AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(aoaHwaObj,
2592  &aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[0],
2593  1,
2594  (DPParams->numVirtualAnt),
2595  &res->azimuthStaticHeatMap[i * (DPParams->numVirtualAnt)],
2596  &res->azimuthStaticHeatMap[i * (DPParams->numVirtualAnt)]);
2597  }
2598 
2599 exit:
2600  return retVal;
2601 }
2602 
2618 void AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
2619  DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg *fovAoaCfg)
2620 {
2621  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minAzimuthSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->minAzimuthDeg / 180. * PI_);
2622  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxAzimuthSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->maxAzimuthDeg / 180. * PI_);
2623  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minElevationSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->minElevationDeg / 180. * PI_);
2624  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxElevationSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->maxElevationDeg / 180. * PI_);
2625 }

2641 uint16_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_getNumHwaParamSets
2642 (
2643  uint16_t numTxAnt,
2644  uint16_t numRxVirtAntElevation
2645 )
2646 {
2647  return (14);
