2649 
2650 DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle DPU_AoAProcHWA_init
2651 (
2652  DPU_AoAProcHWA_InitParams *initParams,
2653  int32_t* errCode
2654 )
2655 {
2656  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = NULL;
2657  HWA_MemInfo hwaMemInfo;
2658  uint8_t index;
2659  SemaphoreP_Params semParams;
2660 
2661  if ((initParams == NULL) || (initParams->hwaHandle == NULL))
2662  {
2663  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2664  goto exit;
2665  }
2666 
2667  aoaHwaObj = MemoryP_ctrlAlloc(sizeof(AOAHwaObj), 0);
2668  if(aoaHwaObj == NULL)
2669  {
2670  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEM;
2671  goto exit;
2672  }
2673 
2674  /* Save for debugging */
2675 #ifdef DBG_AOA_HWA_OBJ_DPU
2676  if (gAoaHwaObjInd < RL_MAX_SUBFRAMES)
2677  {
2678  gAoaHwaObj[gAoaHwaObjInd++] = aoaHwaObj;
2679  }
2680 #endif
2681 
2682  /* Set HWA bank memory address */
2683  *errCode = HWA_getHWAMemInfo(initParams->hwaHandle, &hwaMemInfo);
2684  if (*errCode < 0)
2685  {
2686  goto exit;
2687  }
2688 
2689  /* Initialize memory */
2690  memset((void *)aoaHwaObj, 0, sizeof(AOAHwaObj));
2691 
2692  /* Save init config params */
2693  aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle = initParams->hwaHandle;
2694 
2695  for (index = 0; index < hwaMemInfo.numBanks; index++)
2696  {
2697  aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[index] = hwaMemInfo.baseAddress + index * hwaMemInfo.bankSize;
2698  }
2699 
2700  /* Create semaphore for HWA done */
2701  SemaphoreP_Params_init(&semParams);
2702  semParams.mode = SemaphoreP_Mode_BINARY;
2703  aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle = SemaphoreP_create(0, &semParams);
2704  if(aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle == NULL)
2705  {
2706  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ESEMA;
2707  goto exit;
2708  }
2709 
2710  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn2DFFTBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[0]; //HWA M0
2711  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn2DFFTBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[1]; //HWA M1
2712 
2713  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[2]; //HWA M2
2714  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[3]; //HWA M3
2715 
2716  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn3DFFTBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[0]; //HWA M0
2717  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn3DFFTBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[1]; //HWA M1
2718 
2719  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut3DFFTBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[2]; //HWA M2
2720  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut3DFFTBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[3]; //HWA M3
2721 
2722  aoaHwaObj->hwaAzimuthFftCmplxOutBuffAddr[0] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[2]; //HWA M2
2723  aoaHwaObj->hwaAzimuthFftCmplxOutBuffAddr[1] = aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[3]; //HWA M3
2724 
2725 exit:
2726  return ((DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle)aoaHwaObj);
2727 }
2728 
2729 void AoAProc_configLUT(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj)
2730 {
2731  int32_t txAntIdx, rxAntIdx;
2732  int32_t ind;
2733  int32_t maxRowIdx, maxColIdx;
2734  int32_t minRowIdx, minColIdx;
2735  maxRowIdx = 0;
2736  maxColIdx = 0;
2737  minRowIdx = 0x7fffffff;
2738  minColIdx = 0x7fffffff;
2739 
2740  uint16_t numSymbPerRow[DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_NUM_RX_VIRTUAL_ANTENNAS];
2741 
2742  memset(numSymbPerRow, 0, DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_NUM_RX_VIRTUAL_ANTENNAS * sizeof(uint16_t));
2743 
2744  for(txAntIdx = 0; txAntIdx < aoaHwaObj->params.numTxAntennas; txAntIdx++)
2745  {
2746  for(rxAntIdx = 0; rxAntIdx < aoaHwaObj->params.numRxAntennas; rxAntIdx++)
2747  {
2748  ind = txAntIdx * aoaHwaObj->params.numRxAntennas + rxAntIdx;
2749  aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].colIdx = aoaHwaObj->params.antDef->txAnt[txAntIdx].azimuthOffset + aoaHwaObj->params.antDef->rxAnt[rxAntIdx].azimuthOffset;
2750  aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].rowIdx = aoaHwaObj->params.antDef->txAnt[txAntIdx].elevationOffset + aoaHwaObj->params.antDef->rxAnt[rxAntIdx].elevationOffset;
2751  if (aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].colIdx > maxColIdx)
2752  {
2753  maxColIdx = aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].colIdx;
2754  }
2755  if (aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].rowIdx > maxRowIdx)
2756  {
2757  maxRowIdx = aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].rowIdx;
2758  }
2759 
2760  if (aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].colIdx < minColIdx)
2761  {
2762  minColIdx = aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].colIdx;
2763  }
2764  if (aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].rowIdx < minRowIdx)
2765  {
2766  minRowIdx = aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].rowIdx;
2767  }
2768 
2769  numSymbPerRow[aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].rowIdx]++;
2770  }
2771  }
2772 
2773  aoaHwaObj->numAntRow = maxRowIdx - minRowIdx + 1;
2774  aoaHwaObj->numAntCol = maxColIdx - minColIdx + 1;
2775 
2776  for(ind = 0; ind < (aoaHwaObj->params.numTxAntennas * aoaHwaObj->params.numRxAntennas); ind++)
2777  {
2778  aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].colIdx -= minColIdx;
2779  aoaHwaObj->antForwardMapLUT[ind].rowIdx -= minRowIdx;
2780  }
2781 
2782  if ((aoaHwaObj->numAntCol <= 4) || (aoaHwaObj->numAntRow == 1))
2783  {
2784  aoaHwaObj->cfarDirection = AOAHWA_CFAR_IN_AZIMUTH_DIRECTION; /* CFAR in azimuth direction */
2785  }
2786  else
2787  {
2788  /* Stay in azimuth direction due to HWA CFAR peak grouping issue because
2789  * elevation peak groups are more flat compared to azimuth */
2790  aoaHwaObj->cfarDirection = AOAHWA_CFAR_IN_AZIMUTH_DIRECTION;
2791  }
2792 
2793  if (aoaHwaObj->cfarDirection == AOAHWA_CFAR_IN_AZIMUTH_DIRECTION)
2794  {
2795  aoaHwaObj->maxNumExpectedPeaks = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS * aoaHwaObj->numAntCol;
2796  }
2797  else
2798  {
2799  aoaHwaObj->maxNumExpectedPeaks = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS * aoaHwaObj->numAntRow;
2800  }
2801 
2802  /* For azimuth heat-map, determine the row with maximum number of populated symbols */
2803  aoaHwaObj->antRowWithMaxNumOfSymbols = 0;
2804  aoaHwaObj->maxNumOfSymbolsPerRow = 0;
2805  for (ind = 0; ind < aoaHwaObj->numAntRow; ind++)
2806  {
2807  if(numSymbPerRow[ind] > aoaHwaObj->maxNumOfSymbolsPerRow)
2808  {
2809  aoaHwaObj->maxNumOfSymbolsPerRow = numSymbPerRow[ind];
2810  aoaHwaObj->antRowWithMaxNumOfSymbols = ind;
2811  }
2812  }
2813 
2814 }
2815 
2816 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_config
2817 (
2818  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
2819  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Config *aoaHwaCfg
2820 )
2821 {
2822  int32_t retVal = 0;
2823  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
2824  int32_t i;
2825 
2826  if(aoaHwaObj == NULL)
2827  {
2828  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2829  goto exit;
2830  }
2831 
2832  /* Check if radar cube formats are supported. */
2833  if (!(aoaHwaCfg->res.radarCube.datafmt == DPIF_RADARCUBE_FORMAT_1))
2834  {
2835  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL__RADARCUBE_DATAFORMAT;
2836  goto exit;
2837  }
2838 
2839  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.cfarRngDopSnrList,
2840  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_CFAR_DET_LIST_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2841  {
2842  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_CFAR_DET_LIST;
2843  goto exit;
2844  }
2845 
2846  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjOut,
2847  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_POINT_CLOUD_CARTESIAN_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2848  {
2849  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_POINT_CLOUD_CARTESIAN;
2850  goto exit;
2851  }
2852 
2853  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjOutSideInfo,
2854  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_POINT_CLOUD_SIDE_INFO_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2855  {
2856  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_POINT_CLOUD_SIDE_INFO;
2857  goto exit;
2858  }
2859 
2860  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap,
2861  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2862  {
2863  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
2864  goto exit;
2865  }
2866 
2867  /* Check if radar cube range column fits into one HWA memory bank */
2868  if((aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas *
2869  aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)) > (SOC_HWA_MEM_SIZE/SOC_HWA_NUM_MEM_BANKS))
2870  {
2871  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EEXCEEDHWAMEM;
2872  goto exit;
2873  }
2874 
2875  /* Check if complex values of 2D FFT fit in two HWA memory banks */
2876  if((aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas *
2877  aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)) > (2 * SOC_HWA_MEM_SIZE/SOC_HWA_NUM_MEM_BANKS))
2878  {
2879  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EEXCEEDHWAMEM;
2880  goto exit;
2881  }
2882 
2883  /* Check Heapmap configuration */
2884  if (aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap)
2885  {
2886  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMapSize !=
2887  (aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAnt))
2888  {
2889  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEM__AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
2890  goto exit;
2891  }
2892 
2893  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap == NULL)
2894  {
2895  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2896  goto exit;
2897  }
2898  }
2899 
2900  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjElevationAngle,
2901  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_DET_OBJ_ELEVATION_ANGLE_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2902  {
2903  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_DET_OBJ_ELEVATION_ANGLE;
2904  goto exit;
2905  }
2906 
2907  if (aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap && (aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAnt == 1))
2908  {
2909  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVALID_NUM_VIRT_ANT_AND_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
2910  goto exit;
2911  }
2912 
2913  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjOutMaxSize & 0x1)
2914  {
2915  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EDETECTED_OBJECT_LIST_SIZE_ODD_NUMBER;
2916  goto exit;
2917  }
2918 
2919  for(i = 0; i < DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUFFERS; i++)
2920  {
2921  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBuffer[i],
2922  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2923  {
2924  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUF;
2925  goto exit;
2926  }
2927  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBuffer[i] == NULL)
2928  {
2929  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2930  goto exit;
2931  }
2932  }
2933  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBufferSizeBytes !=
2934  (DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUFFER_SIZE_BYTES(aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas)))
2935  {
2936  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEM_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUF;
2937  goto exit;
2938  }
2939 
2940  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.radarCube.data,
2941  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_RADAR_CUBE_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
2942  {
2943  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_RADAR_CUBE;
2944  goto exit;
2945  }
2946 
2947 #if DEBUG_CHECK_PARAMS
2948  /* Validate params */
2949  if(!aoaHwaCfg->edmaHandle ||
2950  !aoaHwaCfg->hwaHandle ||
2951  !aoaHwaCfg->params ||
2952  !aoaHwaCfg->radarCube ||
2953  !aoaHwaCfg->detObjOut ||
2954  (aoaHwaCfg->numParamSet != 1)
2955  )
2956  {
2957  retVal= DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2958  goto exit;
2959  }
2960 #endif
2961  aoaHwaObj->res = aoaHwaCfg->res;
2962  aoaHwaObj->params = aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg;
2963 
2964  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg = *aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.compRxChanCfg;
2965  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg = *aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg;
2966  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap = aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap;
2967  AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(aoaHwaObj, aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.fovAoaCfg);
2968 
2969  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg = *aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.extMaxVelCfg; //Currently not supported
2970 
2971  /* Allocate buffers for ping and pong paths: */
2972  for (i = 0; i < DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_LOCAL_SCRATCH_BUFFERS; i++)
2973  {
2974  aoaHwaObj->hwaDetectedPeaksList[i] = (DPU_AoAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput *) aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBuffer[i];
2975  aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[i] = (uint32_t *) aoaHwaCfg->res.localScratchBuffer[i];
2976  aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocal2DimAngleFFTInput[i] = &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[i][aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas *
2977  aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas];
2978  }
2979 
2980  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut2DFFTBuffAddr[0] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[0][0];
2981  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut2DFFTBuffAddr[1] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[1][0];
2982  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcIn3DFFTBuffAddr[0] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocal2DimAngleFFTInput[0][0];
2983  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcIn3DFFTBuffAddr[1] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocal2DimAngleFFTInput[1][0];
2984  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut3DFFTBuffAddr[0] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->hwaDetectedPeaksList[0][0];
2985  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut3DFFTBuffAddr[1] = (uint32_t) &aoaHwaObj->hwaDetectedPeaksList[1][0];
2986 
2987  /* Windowing configuraiton in HWA */
2988  retVal = HWA_configRam(aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle,
2989  HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM,
2990  (uint8_t *)aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.window,
2991  aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.windowSize, /* size in bytes */
2992  aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.winRamOffset * sizeof(uint32_t));
2993  if (retVal != 0)
2994  {
2995  goto exit;
2996  }
2997 
2998  /* Configure forward lookup tables to map 2D-FFT antenna symbols */
2999  AoAProc_configLUT(aoaHwaObj);
3000 
3001 exit:
3002  return retVal;
3003 }
3004 
3005 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_process
3006 (
3007  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
3008  uint32_t numObjsIn,
3009  DPU_AoAProcHWA_OutParams *outParams
3010 )
3011 {
3012  volatile uint32_t startTime;
3013  volatile uint32_t startTime1;
3014  volatile uint32_t waitTimeLocal = 0;
3015  int32_t retVal = 0;
3016  uint16_t idx;
3017  uint16_t detObjIdxIn;
3018  uint16_t detObjIdxProc;
3019  uint8_t pingPongIdx;
3020  uint32_t trueNumObjsIn;
3021 
3022  float range;
3023  uint32_t numObjsOut = 0;
3024  uint16_t numParams;
3025  HWA_Handle hwaHandle;
3026 
3027  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj;
3028  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res;
3029  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams;
3030 
3031  if (handle == NULL)
3032  {
3033  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3034  goto exit;
3035  }
3036  aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
3037  res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
3038  DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
3039  hwaHandle = aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle;
3040 
3041  startTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
3042 
3043  if (numObjsIn == 0U)
3044  {
3045  outParams->numAoADetectedPoints = numObjsIn;
3046  outParams->stats.waitTime = 0;
3047  outParams->stats.processingTime = 0;
3048  retVal = 0;
3049  goto exit;
3050  }
3051 
3052  /**********************************************/
3053  /* ENABLE NUMLOOPS DONE INTERRUPT FROM HWA */
3054  /**********************************************/
3055  retVal = HWA_enableDoneInterrupt(hwaHandle,
3056  AOAProcHWADoneIsrCallback,
3057  aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
3058  if (retVal != 0)
3059  {
3060  goto exit;
3061  }
3062 
3063  /* Azimuth heap doppler compensation */
3064  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap)
3065  {
3066  /* Perform 2D FFT for all range bins and save zero Doppler bin */
3067  retVal = AoAProcHWA_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatmap(aoaHwaObj,
3068  &waitTimeLocal);
3069  if (retVal != 0)
3070  {
3071  goto exit;
3072  }
3073  }
3074 
3075  /* Angle estimation */
3076  if(DPParams->numVirtualAnt == 1) //ToDo Currently this is not supported ??? Only 4 Rx antennas
3077  {
3078  /*If there is only one virtual antenna, there is no
3079  need of azimuth FFT as azimuth can not be estimated.*/
3080 
3081  /* Limit number of input samples */
3082  if (numObjsIn > res->detObjOutMaxSize)
3083  {
3084  numObjsIn = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
3085  }
3086 
3087  /* Fill the output list */
3088  for(idx=0; idx < numObjsIn; idx++)
3089  {
3090  range = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].rangeIdx * DPParams->rangeStep;
3091  res->detObjOut[idx].y = range;
3092  res->detObjOut[idx].x = 0.;
3093  res->detObjOut[idx].z = 0.;
3094 
3095  res->detObjOut[idx].velocity = DPParams->dopplerStep *
3096  MATHUTILS_FFT_IDX_TO_SIGNED(res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].dopplerIdx,
3097  DPParams->numDopplerBins);
3098  res->detObjOutSideInfo[idx].snr = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].snr;
3099  res->detObjOutSideInfo[idx].noise = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].noise;
3100  }
3101  numObjsOut = numObjsIn;
3102  }
3103  else
3104  {
3105  /* Limit number of input samples */
3106  if (numObjsIn > res->detObjOutMaxSize)
3107  {
3108  numObjsIn = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
3109  }
3110  trueNumObjsIn = numObjsIn;
3111  /* Make number of detected objects EVEN */
3112  if (numObjsIn & 0x1)
3113  {
3114  /* If odd number of input objects, add dummy as duplicated last object */
3115  res->cfarRngDopSnrList[numObjsIn] = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[numObjsIn-1];
3116  numObjsIn++;
3117  }
3118 
3119  /* Configure HWA Params*/
3120  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config_HWA(
3121  aoaHwaObj,
3122  hwaHandle,
3123  res,
3124  DPParams,
3125  aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr,
3126  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS);
3127  if (retVal != 0)
3128  {
3129  goto exit;
3130  }
3131 
3132  /* Configure Common HWA registers */
3133  uint32_t numDummyParams = 1; /* This is needed to mitigate HWA read register issue */
3134  numParams = AOAHWA_NUM_PING_PONG_BUF*(DPParams->numTxAntennas + 2 + 1 + numDummyParams);
3135  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config_HWA_common (hwaHandle,
3136  numObjsIn/2, //numLoops,
3137  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, //paramStartIdx,
3138  numParams);
3139  if (retVal != 0)
3140  {
3141  goto exit;
3142  }
3143 
3144  /* Configure EDMA */
3145  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config_EDMA(aoaHwaObj,
3146  0,//srcIn2DFFTBuffAddr
3147  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn2DFFTBuffAddr,
3148  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
3149  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut2DFFTBuffAddr,
3150  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcIn3DFFTBuffAddr,
3151  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstIn3DFFTBuffAddr,
3152  aoaHwaObj->edmaSrcOut3DFFTBuffAddr,
3153  aoaHwaObj->edmaDstOut3DFFTBuffAddr);
3154  if (retVal != 0)
3155  {
3156  goto exit;
3157  }
3158 
3159  /* Enable the HWA */
3160  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 1);
3161  if (retVal != 0)
3162  {
3163  goto exit;
3164  }
3165 
3166  /* Trigger first two objects */
3167  detObjIdxIn = 0;
3168  pingPongIdx = 0;
3169  AoAProcHWA_cfgAndTrigger_EDMA_2DFFT(aoaHwaObj,
3170  detObjIdxIn,
3171  pingPongIdx);
3172  detObjIdxIn = 1;
3173  pingPongIdx = 1;
3174  AoAProcHWA_cfgAndTrigger_EDMA_2DFFT(aoaHwaObj,
3175  detObjIdxIn,
3176  pingPongIdx);
3177  /* Loop through the list two objects per loop */
3178  detObjIdxIn = 2;
3179  detObjIdxProc = 0;
3180  while(detObjIdxProc < numObjsIn)
3181  {
3182  for (pingPongIdx = 0; pingPongIdx < 2; pingPongIdx++)
3183  {
3184  /* Wait until EDMA output is done */
3185  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
3186  retVal = AoAProcHWA_waitEdma(aoaHwaObj, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel);
3187  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
3188  if (retVal != 0)
3189  {
3190  goto exit;
3191  }
3192  /* Rx channel gain/phase offset compensation */
3193  AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(aoaHwaObj,
3194  &aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[0],
3195  1,
3196  DPParams->numVirtualAnt,
3197  (cmplx16ImRe_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[pingPongIdx],
3198  (cmplx16ImRe_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[pingPongIdx]);
3199  /* Doppler Compensation - */
3200  AoAProcHWA_dopplerCompensation(aoaHwaObj,
3201  (uint32_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf[pingPongIdx],
3202  &res->cfarRngDopSnrList[detObjIdxProc + pingPongIdx],
3203  (uint32_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocal2DimAngleFFTInput[pingPongIdx],
3204  DPParams->numTxAntennas,
3205  DPParams->numRxAntennas,
3206  DPParams->numDopplerBins);
3207 
3208  /* Trigger 3D-FFT */
3209  AoAProcHWA_trigger_EDMA_3DFFT(aoaHwaObj, pingPongIdx);
3210  }
3211 
3212  for (pingPongIdx = 0; pingPongIdx < 2; pingPongIdx++)
3213  {
3214  /* Wait until EDMA outputs 3D-FFTs and Maximum peaks */
3215  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
3216  retVal = AoAProcHWA_waitEdma(aoaHwaObj, res->edmaHwaExt[pingPongIdx].chOut.channel);
3217  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
3218  if (retVal != 0)
3219  {
3220  goto exit;
3221  }
3222  if (detObjIdxProc < trueNumObjsIn)
3223  {
3224  numObjsOut = AoAProcHWA_angleEstimationAzimElev(aoaHwaObj,
3225  detObjIdxProc,
3226  pingPongIdx,
3227  numObjsOut);
3228  }
3229  if (detObjIdxIn < numObjsIn)
3230  {
3231  /* Trigger 2D-FFT - next target */
3232  AoAProcHWA_cfgAndTrigger_EDMA_2DFFT(aoaHwaObj,
3233  detObjIdxIn,
3234  pingPongIdx);
3235  }
3236  detObjIdxProc++;
3237  detObjIdxIn++;
3238  }
3239 
3240  } /* Loop per two detected points */
3241 
3242  /* Disable the HWA */
3243  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
3244  if (retVal != 0)
3245  {
3246  goto exit;
3247  }
3248 
3249  }
3250 
3251  outParams->numAoADetectedPoints = numObjsOut;
3252  outParams->stats.waitTime = waitTimeLocal;
3253  outParams->stats.processingTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime - waitTimeLocal;
3254 #ifdef PROFILE_AOA_HWA_OBJ_DPU
3255  gAoAProcStats[gAoAProcStatsIdx] = *outParams;
3256  gAoAProcStatsIdx = (gAoAProcStatsIdx +1) & 0xf;
3257 #endif
3258 
3259  /* Process is done, disable Done interrupt */
3260  HWA_disableDoneInterrupt(hwaHandle);
3261 exit:
3262  return retVal;
3263 }
3264 
3265 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_control
3266 (
3267  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
3268  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd cmd,
3269  void *arg,
3270  uint32_t argSize
3271 )
3272 {
3273  int32_t retVal = 0;
3274  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
3275 
3276  /* Get rangeProc data object */
3277  if (aoaHwaObj == NULL)
3278  {
3279  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3280  goto exit;
3281  }
3282 
3283  switch(cmd)
3284  {
3285  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_FovAoACfg:
3286  {
3287  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg)) ||
3288  (arg == NULL))
3289  {
3290  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3291  goto exit;
3292  }
3293  else
3294  {
3295  /* Save configuration */
3296  AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(aoaHwaObj, (DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg *) arg);
3297 
3298  }
3299  }
3300  break;
3301  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_MultiObjBeamFormingCfg:
3302  {
3303  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_MultiObjBeamFormingCfg)) ||
3304  (arg == NULL))
3305  {
3306  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3307  goto exit;
3308  }
3309  else
3310  {
3311  /* Save configuration */
3312  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg, arg, argSize);
3313  }
3314  }
3315  break;
3316  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_ExtMaxVelocityCfg:
3317  {
3318  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_ExtendedMaxVelocityCfg)) ||
3319  (arg == NULL))
3320  {
3321  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3322  goto exit;
3323  }
3324  else
3325  {
3326  /* Save configuration */
3327  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.extMaxVelCfg, arg, argSize);
3328  }
3329  }
3330  break;
3331  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_CompRxChannelBiasCfg:
3332  {
3333  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_compRxChannelBiasCfg)) ||
3334  (arg == NULL))
3335  {
3336  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3337  goto exit;
3338  }
3339  else
3340  {
3341  /* Save configuration */
3342  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg, arg, argSize);
3343  }
3344  }
3345  break;
3346  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap:
3347  {
3348  if((argSize != sizeof(bool)) ||
3349  (arg == NULL))
3350  {
3351  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3352  goto exit;
3353  }
3354  else
3355  {
3356  /* Sanity check on saved heapmap ptr and size */
3357  if ((aoaHwaObj->res.azimuthStaticHeatMapSize !=
3358  (aoaHwaObj->params.numRangeBins * aoaHwaObj->params.numVirtualAnt)) ||
3359  (aoaHwaObj->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap == NULL))
3360  {
3361  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3362  goto exit;
3363  }
3364 
3365  /* Save configuration */
3366  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap, arg, argSize);
3367  }
3368  }
3369  break;
3370  default:
3371  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3372  break;
3373  }
3374 exit:
3375  return (retVal);
3376 }
3377 
3378 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_deinit(DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle)
3379 {
3380  int32_t retVal = 0;
3381 
3382  if (handle == NULL)
3383  {
3384  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
3385  goto exit;
3386  }
3387  MemoryP_ctrlFree(handle, sizeof(AOAHwaObj));
3388 exit:
3389  return (retVal);
3390 }
